CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 To date , solar power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) of 10.6% and 9.2% have been demonstrated in the cells with tandem and single junction structures , respectively , representing an important advance in the development of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. Solar power conversion efficiencies (PCE)
2. Tandem structures
3. Single junction structures
4. PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells)

Explanation:
The paragraph discusses the solar power conversion efficiencies (PCE) of two types of solar cell structures: tandem and single junction. The material entities are the solar power conversion efficiencies themselves, and the structures that achieve these efficiencies: tandem structures and single junction structures. Additionally, the paragraph mentions the development of Perovskite Solar Cells (PSCs), which are a type of solar cell technology.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PCE (solar power conversion efficiencies)
2. Tandem structures
3. Single junction structures
4. Perovskite Solar Cells (PSCs)

Explanation:
The paragraph discusses the solar power conversion efficiencies (PCE) of two types of solar cell structures: tandem and single junction. The material entities are the solar power conversion efficiencies themselves, and the structures that achieve these efficiencies: tandem structures and single junction structures. Additionally, the paragraph mentions Perovskite Solar Cells (PSCs) as a specific type of solar cell technology. Therefore, the relevant material entities are the solar power conversion efficiencies, tandem structures, single junction structures, and Perovskite Solar Cells. Other entities, such as "to date," "representing an important advance," and "development," are not material entities and can be removed.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Solar power conversion efficiencies (PCE) |
| Tandem structures |
| Single junction structures |
| Perovskite Solar Cells (PSCs) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 To date , solar power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) of 10.6% and 9.2% have been demonstrated in the cells with tandem and single junction structures , respectively , representing an important advance in the development of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. Solar power conversion efficiencies (PCE) - This is a property value representing the ability of solar cells to convert solar energy into electrical energy.
2. 10.6% - This is a specific value of the solar power conversion efficiency for cells with tandem structures.
3. 9.2% - This is a specific value of the solar power conversion efficiency for cells with single junction structures.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Solar power conversion efficiencies (PCE) - This is a property value representing the ability of solar cells to convert solar energy into electrical energy.
2. 10.6% - This is a specific value of the solar power conversion efficiency for cells with tandem structures.
3. 9.2% - This is a specific value of the solar power conversion efficiency for cells with single junction structures.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Solar power conversion efficiencies (PCE) |
| 10.6% (for cells with tandem structures) |
| 9.2% (for cells with single junction structures) |
